means: 没有受到损失或免于法律责任的

sentence.Network_en: Industry has been working at developing harmless substitutes for these gases.
sentence.Network_cn: 该行业一直在努力开发一些可以替代这些气体的无害物质。

sentence.Network_en: Johnny was the most persistent and most harmless of her admirers.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰尼是追她的人中最痴心、最没有心机的一个。

sentence.Network_en: I would not want to deny them a harmless pleasure.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不想剥夺他们这点无伤大雅的乐趣。

entry.tran: 无害的;（尤指对健康）不造成伤害的
entry.def: Something that is harmless does not have any bad effects, especially on people's health.

example.ex: Industry has been working at developing harmless substitutes for these gases...
example.tran: 该行业一直在努力开发一些可以替代这些气体的无害物质。

example.ex: This experiment was harmless to the animals.
example.tran: 这个试验不会对动物造成伤害。

entry.tran: 无关紧要的;不讨人厌的;不会惹麻烦的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as harmless, you mean that they are not important and therefore unlikely to annoy other people or cause trouble.

example.tran: 他看起来不会惹什么麻烦。

example.ex: I would not want to deny them a harmless pleasure.
example.tran: 我不想剥夺他们这点无伤大雅的乐趣。

means.word_mean: 1. not causing or capable of causing harm;
2. not injurious to physical or mental health
4. unlikely to harm or disturb anyone;
5. not threatening to life or health; not malignant;

auth_sentence.content: Thus, it is harmless when outside the body.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus, it is harmless when outside the body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus, it is harmless when outside the body.

auth_sentence.content: Harmless womanly things, like spending money on clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Harmless womanly things, like spending money on clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Harmless womanly things, like spending money on clothes.

auth_sentence.content: These proteins are called allergens and are normally harmless.
auth_sentence.res_content: These proteins are called allergens and are normally harmless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These proteins are called allergens and are normally harmless.

sentences.en: They killed the harmless old man in cold blood.
sentences.cn: 他们残忍地杀害了那位无辜老人。
